document.full_text: prosecutors must give defense lawyers a tape recorder at the center of the case against a somali-born teen charged with plotting to blow up a christmas-tree lighting event in portland, a judge ruled on wednesday.
document.title: defense gains access to recorder in oregon bomb case
lines_and_colors: prosecutors must give defense lawyers a tape recorder at the center of the case against a somali-born teen charged with plotting to blow up a christmas-tree lighting event in portland, a judge ruled on wednesday.
